title: Rick and Morty
desc: This project consists of the development of an api to search and filter the characters of the Rick and Morty series using React.js

title: Netflis
desc: Netflix is a series searcher, it allows you to have your own list of favorite series and it is made with Javascript.

title: Creame un club
desc: This application is used to create clubs and add them to the list. It also allows you to delete and keep then saved in Local Storage. It's made with Javascript.

title: Awesome profile cards
desc: I worked on this project in group, we inherited a code and from Javascript we passed it to React.js. We also made the connection to a Heroku server with Node.js.

title: Suerte infinita
desc: This is just created to provide good luck to Adalabers in their first exam
